    • findRotorConfiguration

      public static ScoredEnigmaKey[] findRotorConfiguration(char[] ciphertext, AvailableRotors rotors, String plugboard, int requiredKeys, FitnessFunction f, String machineType)
      Finds the best rotor configurations by trying every possible configuration and measuring their fitness, returning them in an array in order of best fitness
      Parameters:
      ciphertext - the encoded text to run testing on
      rotors - selection of rotors to choose from, defined by enum
      plugboard - plugboard settings
      requiredKeys - the max number of ScoredEnigmaKeys to return
      f - fitness function to use for scoring keys
      Returns:
      an array of ScoredEnigmaKey objects, in order of best fitness

    • findRingSettings

      public static ScoredEnigmaKey findRingSettings(EnigmaKey key, char[] ciphertext, FitnessFunction f, String machineType)
      Calculates the best fitness based on the rotors and ring settings
      Parameters:
      key - machine configuration
      ciphertext - encoded text to run analysis on
      f - fitness function to use
      Returns:
      highest fitness enigma settings
